ai-patthana23.50:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.50:0.3_0: for one who wraps in seven ways,
ai-patthana23.50:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to satisfaction. It doesn’t give rise to satisfaction for the sake of resistance.
ai-patthana23.50:1.1_1: This is the reason why the Universal Monarch lack of single intention.
ai-patthana23.50:2.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, repulsion, views, doubt, conceit gives rise to the expansion.
ai-patthana23.50:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.50:3.1_0: Not inappropriate principles, not for someone who has conditions, it doesn’t give rise to unpleasant feeling.
ai-patthana23.50:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
